description: Rich and creamy pork bone broth with chashu pork, marinated soft-boiled egg, and green onions.
A hearty miso-based broth with ground pork, bean sprouts, corn, and spicy chili oil.
A clear soy sauce-based broth with sliced roast chicken, bamboo shoots, and nori seaweed.
A flavorful vegetable broth with tofu, assorted seasonal vegetables, and a choice of noodles.
A seafood-infused broth with shrimp, mussels, squid, and fish, garnished with green onions and cilantro.
A spicy Szechuan-style ramen with ground pork, bok choy, and a peanut-sesame sauce.
Chilled ramen noodles served over mixed greens, with grilled chicken, sesame dressing, and crispy wonton strips.
Customers can customize their ramen by choosing their preferred broth, protein, noodles and toppings.
A creation with a zesty lemonade by mixing fresh yuzu juice with lemon juice, simple syrup, and sparkling water for a fizzy, tangy drink.
A mix of sake with cherry blossom syrup and a splash of sparkling water. Garnished with a maraschino cherry for a delicious floral note.
This effervescent drink combines lychee juice, ginger syrup, and soda water. It's sweet, tangy, and has a pleasant ginger kick.
Genmaicha is a traditional Japanese green tea blended with roasted brown rice. It has a nutty, earthy flavor with a hint of sweetness from the rice.
